## InputValidationErrorHandlerStrategy class

Strategy for handling input validation errors with standardized 400 responses.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class InputValidationErrorHandlerStrategy implements IErrorHandlingStrategy 
```
**Implements:** IErrorHandlingStrategy

## Remarks

This strategy: - Handles InputValidationError instances from validation failures - Returns 400 Bad Request status code - Preserves structured validation error details for client feedback - Logs validation failures as warnings

## Example


```typescript
const validationStrategy = new InputValidationErrorHandlerStrategy(logger);

// Handles errors from:
// - Zod validation failures
// - Custom validation logic
// - Data transformation errors
```
